text: John Carswell may refer to: *Séon Carsuel, c. 1522 – 1572), a Protestant reformer *J. P. Carswell (John Patrick Carswell, 1918–1997), English civil servant and author *John Carswell (bowls) (1887–unknown), a Scottish international lawn bowler *John Caswell (1654 or 1655 – 1712), sometimes John Carswell, an English mathematician *John Douglas Wilson Carswell (born 1971), better known as Douglas Carswell, British Member of Parliament ==See also== *Carswell, a surname
title: John Carswell
